src_original: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate /

apagacchati nānyathā /  tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /  anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
